tool.name: Beacon2 Runs
tool.description: Query the runs collection in the beacon database
tool.command: #set $db_auth_source = $__user__.extra_preferences.get('beacon2_account|db_auth_source', "") #if $db_auth_source == "": #set $db_auth_source = "admin" #end if echo "Running as user: $db_auth_source. Set your credentials via: User -> Preferences -> Manage Information" && #set $db_user = $__user__.extra_preferences.get('beacon2_account|db_user', "") #if $db_user == "": #set $db_user = "root" #end if echo "Running as user: $db_user. Set your credentials via: User -> Preferences -> Manage Information" && #set $db_password = $__user__.extra_preferences.get('beacon2_account|db_password', "") #if $db_password == "": #set $db_password = "example" #end if echo "Running as user: $db_password. Set your credentials via: User -> Preferences -> Manage Information" && beacon2-search runs --db-host '$db_host' --db-port $db_port --database '$database' --collection '$collection' --advance-connection --db-auth-source '$db_auth_source' --db-user '$db_user' --db-password '$db_password' #if str($advanced_settings.identification) --identification '$advanced_settings.identification' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.individualId) --individualId '$advanced_settings.individualId' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.libraryLayout) --libraryLayout '$advanced_settings.libraryLayout' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.librarySelection) --librarySelection '$advanced_settings.librarySelection' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.librarySource) --librarySource '$advanced_settings.librarySource' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.libraryStrategy) --libraryStrategy '$advanced_settings.libraryStrategy' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.platform) --platform '$advanced_settings.platform' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.platformModel) --platformModel '$advanced_settings.platformModel' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.runDate) --runDate '$advanced_settings.runDate' #end if > runs_query_findings.json

param.label: INDIVIDUAL ID
param.help: Reference to the individual ID, e.g. TCGA-AO-A0JJ

param.label: LIBRARY LAYOUT
param.help: Ontology value for the library layout e.g 'PAIRED', 'SINGLE'

param.label: LIBRARY SELECTION
param.help: Selection method for library preparation, e.g 'RANDOM', 'RT-PCR'

param.label: LIBRARY SOURCE
param.help: Ontology value for the source of the sequencing or hybridization library, e.g 'genomic source', 'transcriptomic source'

param.label: PLATFORM
param.help: General platform technology label where the specific model is not relevant, e.g. Illumina

param.label: PLATFORM MODEL
param.help: Ontology value for experimental platform or methodology used, e.g. 'Illumina HiSeq 3000'

param.label: RUN DATE
param.help: Date at which the experiment was performed

tool.help: Beacon2 Runs queries the runs collection in the Beacon database for details on procedures used for sequencing a biosample.
